data.text:
Published 1:38 am Friday, August 2, 2024

At +2000, the West Virginia Mountaineers have the ninth-ranked odds in the conference to win the Big 12 in 2024. In addition they have +25000 odds to claim the College Football Playoff National Championship. Dig into the odds and other stats below before placing a futures bet.

Sign up for BetMGM to bet on West Virginia Mountaineers’ odds to win their conference or the national championship.

West Virginia Big 12 Conference and National Championship Odds

National Championship Odds: +25000 (Bet $10 to win $2,500.00)

Big 12 Conference Championship Odds: +2000 (Bet $10 to win $200.00)

Season Win Total Over/Under: 6.5 (Bet $13.50 to win $10 on the over with -135 odds)

Bet on West Virginia Mountaineers futures odds & games on BetMGM.

West Virginia 2024 Schedule

In terms of difficulty, based on its opponents’ combined win total last season, West Virginia will be playing the 55th-ranked schedule this year. In 2024, the Mountaineers will go head-to-head with eight teams that had winning records last season, including three that won nine or more games, while facing three squads that notched three or fewer wins a season ago.

Watch West Virginia Mountaineers games all season long on Fubo!
